description: Describes the assessment targets that are specified by the ARNs of the assessment targets.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN that specifies the Amazon Inspector assessment target.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Inspector assessment target.

nested_items.name: resourceGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN that specifies the resource group that is associated with the assessment target.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the assessment target is created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which  UpdateAssessmentTarget is called.

nested_items.name: failedItems
nested_items.description: Assessment target details that cannot be described. An error code is provided for each failed item.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: The status code of a failed item.

nested_items.name: retryable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether you can immediately retry a request for this item for a specified resource.
